title: Quick Check: Old and unrelated video from Azerbaijan shared as 'Police implementing lockdown in Spain'
subtitle: The video is not related to COVID-19 lockdown in any country. The video shows Azerbaijan Police (not Spain) dispersing a protest in October 2019.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of Police beating and arresting people is being shared with a claim that it shows Police strictly implementing COVID-19 lockdown in Spain. FACTLY has found that the video was taken in October 2019 in Azerbaijan, not Spain. In the video, the Police were dispersing a protest .

Did you watch our new video?
